Xylene.Definition: Organic Compound;Solvent;Aromatic Hydrocarbon; Xylene refers to the mixture of its three aromatic hydrocarbon isomers: meta-xylene, ortho-xylene, and para-xylene. It occurs naturally in petroleum and coal tar, and is major component of gasoline and fuel oil. Xylene is used mainly as a solvent and in the printing, rubber, and leather industries.
